title: Honor Capsule Crashed Client..No contents
body: I opened a capsule as a game was popping and when i left game the client was 1'' wide by 1/2'' tall..never received the contents of capsule after i restarted league.. :( I should have taken a screen shot.

replies.body: Hold onto your pants here, cus it looks like that Honor Capsule had 2 key fragments and the rare Grey Warwick skin!!!
My freakin pants are out of here....am I going to be able to get any help with this or am I out of luck?

Guess I aimed my joke a bit too high, my bad! 

That Honor Capsule gave you the Grey Warwick skin, check your collection for the skin and you should be able to see the key fragment in your hextech inventory. The items were already added to your account successfully!
